relevant_findings.general: Resting comfortably in bed, no apparent distress.
relevant_findings.skin: Ecchymosis over left femoral distribution, purple in color. Non-tender to palpation. Keratinic lesion consistent with cutaneous horn over mid-sternum.
relevant_findings.pulmonary: Mild end-expiratory wheezes throughout. Moderate air-movement, improving. No clear crackles.
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: JVP 9-10 cm. Irregularly irregular rhythm. Distant heart sounds. Normal S1, S2. No murmurs.
relevant_findings.abdominal: Bowel sounds quiet but present. Mild distension. Non-tender. Plethoric soft tissue. No clear organomegaly.
relevant_findings.extremities: Radial pulses 2+. Excision site dressed on left shin. Healing well with good granulation tissue, fibrinous exudate, no erythema or purulence. Hyperpigmentation over shins bilaterally. 1+ pitting edema of the left foot. Capillary refill within normal range.
relevant_findings.neurological: Grossly intact without focality. Able to stand independently.
relevant_findings.drains_tubes: PICC site: No significant hematoma, tenderness, or fresh bleeding. Foley: Draining yellow urine, non-cloudy.
